efficiency.translation[0].definitions[0]: the quality of doing something well and effectively, without wasting time, money, or energy
the efficiency of the train service

efficiency.translation[1].definitions[0]: how well an industrial process, factory, or business works so that it produces as much as possible from the time, money, and resources that are put into it
A successful business constantly strives for greater efficiency.
The increase in profitability is the result of improved efficiency.
efficiency.translation[1].definitions[1]: how well and quickly a person or machine works

I had to admire his efficiency.
efficiency.translation[1].definitions[2]: when something costs as little as possible, uses as little fuel as possible etc
